title: Android 13 might have more Material You color options
content:
Google’s Material You was added in Android 12, and we saw that it was finally added to AOSP in Android 12L. Now that it’s going to be coming to more OEMs, Google is working on improving it for the release of Android 13, and one of its first improvements looks like it will pack up

The post Android 13 might have more Material You color options appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 might have more Material You color options, according to a new report. Those color options can currently be accessed through adb.
